title.rendered: Intellectsoft is the “Official App Developer” for the World’s Biggest Ski Event

content.rendered:
Oslo, Norway, February 27 — Intellectsoft, a global full-cycle IT software solutions provider with a local office in Oslo, Norway, was announced as the “Official App Developer” for the Holmenkollen Ski Festival, the most anticipated sports event in Norway. The ski festival will take place 9 through 11 and 15 through 18 of March in the neighborhood of Holmenkollen in Oslo.

For over a hundred years, Holmenkollen has been hosting international ski jumping and cross-country skiing events that draw thousands of spectators to the ski arena and tracks in the local forest. As an official app developer, Intellectsoft has designed and developed an event application that will bring comprehensive coverage of the Ski Festival to the visitors, as well as provide them with all the necessary information about the event.

Aiming at bringing fans closer than ever before to the sports action, the app will show the news updates, statistics, and real-time scores from to the event’s visitors. The official application also provides the location’s map, schedule, navigational information about how to get to Holmenkollen, the city of Oslo, and tourist attractions in Oslo and Norway in general.

“Ski sports are the most popular type of sports among Norwegians. We are very proud to be a part of the biggest and the most anticipated sports event in the country,” says Dennis Shpakouski, Managing Director of Intellectsoft’s Nordic office. “With great pleasure, we will introduce our official app for Holmenkollen sports events, which will give all spectators and fans the ability to always have access to latest news and updates right in their pockets. Built on Intellectsoft’s recently updated low-code platform Mobile Roadie, the app will provide an unparalleled user experience in a clean, streamlined design. See you in Holmenkollen!”

excerpt.rendered: Our app will guide and inform the guests.
